targets.query: SELECT sum("value") FROM "memory_value" WHERE "host" =~ /^$host$/ AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time(10s) fill(null)

panels.description:
CPU time in ms derivative over 1 second.  
1 second of CPU time used is equivalent to fully using 1 core.  Multithreaded processes may use more.
panels.title: $host ceph daemon cpu time (invert sys)
